_comment: Scrapes individual deck lists from all tournaments (Regional, Special Event, LAIC, EUIC, NAIC, Worlds, International). Scraper stoppt bei Tournament ID 391. max_tournaments=100 ensures we get ~87 matching tournaments after filtering. append_mode=false for full rebuild. WICHTIG: Scraping dauert deutlich l√§nger (ca. 1-2 Minuten pro Turnier).
